sqls.sql: select m1.id,m1.name,m1.code,m1.url as url_,m1.isButton,m1.buttonCode,m1.icon as icon_,m1.parentId,m2.name as pname from platform_menu m1 left join platform_menu m2 on m1.parentId=m2.id where 1=1 <#if key["m1.parentId"]??> and (m1.parentId=:m1.parentId or m1.id=:m1.parentId ) </#if> <#if key["m1.name"]??> and lower(m1.name) like lower(:m1.name) </#if> <#if key["m1.url"]??> and lower(m1.url) like lower(:m1.url) </#if> <#if key["sort"]??> order by m1.:sort :order <#else> order by m1.sortorder asc </#if>
update platform_menu set parentId=:parentId where id=:id
delete from Menu where id in (:id)

select distinct m.* from platform_menu m <#if key["uid"]=="-1"> order by m.levelCount asc,m.sortOrder asc <#else> left join platform_permission p on p.mid=m.id where p.rid in (select roleId from platform_user_role u where u.userId=:u.uid) order by m.levelcount asc,m.sortOrder asc </#if>
